Content: Depending on the warp method there should be a warp inhibitor:  <ul>

• Slip stream may have stoppers in the stream
  • Warp lanes may

have inhibitors in a system
  • Warp jump may be stopped by an

inhibitor bubble
  • Wormholes may be stopped from forming by an
inhibitor in the system They may also just reduce the
efficency of this method reducing speed or the size of the vessels that
